properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS UNTIL 18 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-57.78S 037-30.11W AND 03-51.76S 036-20.54W.
   B. 19 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-06.36S 037-36.71W AND 04-11.79S 036-12.34W.
   C. 20 AND 21 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-10.66S 037-40.10W AND 04-16.09S 036-15.64W.
   D. 22 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-14.95S 037-43.32W AND 04-20.38S 036-18.93W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 23 DEC 12.
